main event: A reported UFO sighting involved a V-shaped object observed traveling south-west over Saginaw, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was described as having several lights with one particularly bright light at the V point., It was observed at approximately 1000 feet above the observers' vehicle., The object was reported to be moving at about 35-40 MPH., The sighting was documented by multiple witnesses, including a deputy sheriff and the control tower of a local airport., The sighting occurred at night.
witness description: Deputy sheriff, a civilian, and the control tower personnel from Tri-City Airport.
